Name: Shuttle World
About the game: Shuttle World is a third person simulation business game. I believe that most people are struggling to achieve financial freedom and strive to become the boss of the richest party; Although this road is very difficult, we are still working hard; At the beginning of the game, you will play a penniless freelancer, come to a strange city, use your wisdom, arrange your time reasonably, shuttle through the streets of the city, and work hard to survive. After solving the problem of food and clothing, whether to become the boss of the richest party or a professional technician depends on your choice Basic play 1. Start from scratch and solve the problem of food and clothing In the beginning, the vagrants earn the first bucket of gold by picking up waste products, and then help others run errands and deliver takeaway food to keep themselves alive. 2. Reasonable planning and getting rich depends on brain Whether to become a migrant worker (work) or an entrepreneur (set up a stall, open a shop), use your brain to turn your salted fish around and turn your life around. 3. Climb to the top of life as you like
